item.title: Neovim Format on Save - No Plugin
item.description: Now that null-ls is no longer going to be maintained, I was wondering how to get the same behavior, but without null-ls. So my end goal is this: I want to execute format on a specific file whenever I save that file. Specifically I want to run the elixir formatter whenever I save an *.ex or *.exs file And the solution is: vim.api.nvim_create_autocmd("BufWritePre", { group = vim.api.nvim_create_augroup("FormatBeforeSaveElixirFiles", {clear = true}), pattern = {"*.

item.description: Contents Exercise Description Code With Me Exercise Setup Solution 1 Solution 2 Solution 3 Today is the first day of my journey with my friend Dennis Dang on doing the Top 150 Interview Study Plan from Leet Code Exercise Description The first exercise is about Merge Sorted Array .
